knimeNode.name: FID Digital Filter Remover
knimeNode.shortDescription: Removes the Bruker-specific digital filter data.

fullDescription.intro: Removes the Bruker-specific digital filter data from the beginning of a FID signal.The input is FID data containing Bruker-specific, digital filter signals at the very beginning of the data set. The output is a "cleaned-up" data set, without those specific signals at the beginning of the FID.
